summary: When a meteorite lands near his family farm during a storm in Tennessee, the son of a struggling farmer believes it's connected to strange plague-like events afflicting the crops, the farm animals and even the family themeselves.
cast: Wil Wheaton|Claude Akins|Malcolm Danare|Cooper Huckabee|John Schneider|Amy Wheaton|Steve Carlisle|Kathleen Jordon Gregory|Hope North|Steve Davis|Angelo Casadei
title: Granja maldita
